description: Yuck... your chin's erupting in bright red ugly zits again!That cool guy is not going to take a second look at you now.- Acne breakouts occur at the most inopportune times- If you poke and prod at the zits, they'll just look even worse- That great night out you were planning has just gone south... BIG-styleThat's crazy when there's a simple, effective answer.Fast-drying Micronized Benzoyl Peroxide 5% immediately kills acne causing bacteria on contact. Glycolic Acid 5% effectively reduces the sebum level in pores by 70%, as it clears away cellular debris within 24 hours, leaving skin blemish free.Helps prevent fresh acne breakouts and possible subsequent scarring, but most importantly... Kills zits fast!A clinically proven product that truly has a profound effect on acn, literally over-night.- Uses groundbreaking acne clearing ingredients that penetrate deep within the pores- Fights acne bacteria on the spot- Prevents breakouts before they start- Clears away cellular debris within 24 hours- Exfoliates gently to increase cellular turnover, leaving skin refined and retexturizedFinally the answer to your acne problems in one simple, convenient and truly effective way.Specifically formulated for acne sufferers to get results fast through localised topical application. Hit that p.acnes bacteria filled eruption head on, and kill it stone dead.Hollywood Starshave known for years about the benefits that our range of acne treatment products can give, they pay Beverley Hills' dermatologists a fortune for the secret, but not you.You too can have clear, blemish free natural skin!Full 90-Day Money-Back Guarantee. So nothing to lose and a naturally clear complexion to gain!You deserve to have that perfect Hollywood complexion too!Hit that"Add to Cart"button now
title: Acne Treatments - Hollywood acne treatment cream that works
